title: Add temporary principal display to help owner find their Internet Identity principal

requirements.text: After the user logs in with Internet Identity, display their principal ID prominently on screen (e.g., in the header or a banner at the top of the page) so the owner can easily copy it. The display should show the full principal string in a copyable format (e.g., a text field or a copy-to-clipboard button). Label it clearly as 'Your Internet Identity Principal'.

quotes: I can update the app to display your principal on screen after you log in, so you can easily copy and paste it back to me

acceptanceCriteria: When logged in with Internet Identity, the user's principal ID is visible on screen
The principal is displayed as a readable string that can be selected and copied
A copy-to-clipboard button is available next to the principal string
The display is clearly labeled 'Your Internet Identity Principal'
The principal display only appears when the user is logged in (not shown to anonymous visitors)

constraints: Do not modify any files listed in frontend.immutablePaths
Do not change the backend schema or admin authorization logic
nonGoals: Hardcoding the admin principal (this will be done after the owner shares their principal)
Any changes to the merchandise store, blog, polls, or gallery features
